title: TRYING TO RECONNECT
body:
Hey there! 
It's been a while now, 2 weeks or more, since i started experiencing this issue:
Basically almost every time i enter in one of my acc in EUW, once the client finished the q to enter, it compares an error that blocks every possible option i have to utilize the client.

Trying to reconnect...
we are attempting to automatically reconnect you to league of legends. If your internet connection is otherwise ok, check our support page for possible solutions.
EXIT INSTEAD(clickable)

The fun part is that i do not experience this problem if i switch the server to EUNE for example, or to another region.
i've been trying to follow every step given me by the support page, and tried to re-download or repair the client. Nothing worked.
I'm concerned.
Help 

Priamo

P.S. i use Mac

replies.body: It wouldn't be entirely uncommon to get a clear connection to one server but not be able to connect to a different one since that connection will most likely take different routes to the servers. Make sure that you went through the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but if you have already go ahead and reach out to our techies in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
